# Data Import and Cleaning
```{r}
# test
week12_list <- fromJSON("https://www.reddit.com/r/IOPsychology/.json", flatten = T)
week12_original_tbl <- week12_list$data$children
week12_tbl <- week12_original_tbl %>%
  select(post = data.title,
         upvotes = data.ups)
```
